00022 #region Usings
00023 using System.Collections.Generic;
00024 
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.Media.Image.Procedural
00028 {
00032     public class CellularMap
00033     {
00034         #region Constructors
00035 
00043         public CellularMap(int Seed, int Width, int Height,int NumberOfPoints)
00044         {
00045             _Width = Width;
00046             _Height = Height;
00047             Random.Random Rand = new Random.Random(Seed);
00048             Distances = new float[Width, Height];
00049             ClosestPoint = new int[Width, Height];
00050             for (int x = 0; x < NumberOfPoints; ++x)
00051             {
00052                 Point TempPoint = new Point();
00053                 TempPoint.X = Rand.Next(0, Width);
00054                 TempPoint.Y = Rand.Next(0, Height);
00055                 Points.Add(TempPoint);
00056             }
00057             CalculateDistances();
00058         }
00059 
00060         #endregion
00061 
00062         #region Private Functions
00063 
00067         private void CalculateDistances()
00068         {
00069             for (int x = 0; x < _Width; ++x)
00070             {
00071                 for (int y = 0; y < _Height; ++y)
00072                 {
00073                     FindClosestPoint(x, y);
00074                 }
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00083         private void FindClosestPoint(int x, int y)
00084         {
00085             float MaxDistance=float.MaxValue;
00086             int Index = -1;
00087             for (int z = 0; z < Points.Count; ++z)
00088             {
00089                 float Distance = (float)System.Math.Sqrt(((Points[z].X - x) * (Points[z].X - x)) + ((Points[z].Y - y) * (Points[z].Y - y)));
00090                 if (Distance < MaxDistance)
00091                 {
00092                     MaxDistance = Distance;
00093                     Index = z;
00094                 }
00095             }
00096             ClosestPoint[x, y] = Index;
00097             Distances[x, y] = MaxDistance;
00098         }
00099 
00100         #endregion
00101 
00102         #region Public Properties
00103 
00107         public int[,] ClosestPoint { get; set; }
00108 
00112         public float[,] Distances { get; set; }
00113 
00114         #endregion
00115 
00116         #region Private Properties
00117         private List<Point> Points = new List<Point>();
00118         private int _Width = 0;
00119         private int _Height = 0;
00120         #endregion
00121     }
00122 
00123     #region Internal Classes
00124 
00128     internal class Point
00129     {
00130         #region Constructor
00131 
00135         public Point() { }
00136 
00137         #endregion
00138 
00139         #region Public Properties
00140 
00144         public int X { get; set; }
00145 
00149         public int Y { get; set; }
00150 
00151         #endregion
00152     }
00153 
00154     #endregion
00155 }
